FuncDef: This command specifies the maximum number of groups for which MLD can have local receiver information based on received MLD reports on this interface. When this configuration is changed dynamically to a value lower than the currently accepted number of groups, the groups that are already accepted are not deleted. Only new groups will not be allowed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of groups for this interface. Values-1 to 16000.

ExtraInfo: Default: 0 (no limit to the number of groups)
